images.title: Dusty Sheppard
images.description: Protecting The Troops With “Soldier Dogs” With Maria Goodavage

images.title: Sighthound
images.description: The Africanis is a landrace of South African dogs. It is believed to be of ancient origin, directly descended from hounds and pariah dogs of ancient Africa.

images.title: Feral Dogs
images.description: The Africanis Society of Southern Africa aims to conserve the Africanis as a landrace rather than develop it as a breed. The Africanis is recognized by the Kennel Union of South Africa (KUSA) as an emerging breed.
